name: Virtual Taskforce Demo
description:
Virtual Taskforce is a turn-based multiplayer strategy game that is loosely based on numerous RTS games.

The game is still very early in development and doesn't look top notch due to our lack of an artist working on the project. We're working our hardest to fix this!

Each player will start out with 5 squads, each with their own units to tactically outplay their opposition and dominate the map.

This game is a multiplayer only game and requires a minimum of 2 players, so don't forget to send a copy to a friend so you can play together!

Controls are as follows:

  • Left Mouse Click to select a Unit.
  • Right Mouse Click to select an enemy Unit to attack. Then click the Attack button on the HUD to confirm the attack.
  • WSAD to move the camera

To create a server simply enter a server name and a player name in the "Create Game" section of the main menu and click the create button.

If you don't have a friend willing to play with you. Tweet (or DM) us @M9DevTeam and one of the developers will play a game with you (hopefully we're not busy working on the game!)
